contents.item: Time should be spent happily without regrets.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: All the so-called "secrets of success" will not work unless you do.
Use time to be a seeker of the Kingdom
Strategy can turn a losing battle into a winning battle.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: Good times don’t last and bad times don’t stay forever.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: Success without a successor is a failure
The product you produced is the evidence of the value in your life
Time spent wisely gets compensated
To be successful, look for the job you will take if you don't need a job
You can only gain the benefit of something when you invest and spend time
Money is a compensation for time spent
Only time can reveal the future.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: Time well-spent is life well-lived.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: If you can do a half-assed job of anything, you're a one-eyed man in a kingdom of the blind.
Always convert your time into wisdom
Your race against life must yield effort for you to be productive
Work always makes a difference.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: You must always overcome your comfort zone
Proper and effective time management is the best way to make it in life
A life without concrete product is a meaningless one
Sometimes a problem itself offers its own solution.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: Time is the source of greatness
Your job cannot sustain you, only your calling can
No human was created without a purpose
Those who waste time eventually become wasted
You multiply your life when you invest it
It’s only when you find God that you can discover your calling
Joblessness sets you free
When you are unemployed, weekends are seven days long.
Losing your job gives you access to time
Devote time wisely to discover your true self
Money is created from time
Do not whine... Do not complain. Work harder. Spend more time alone.
Speed is the ability to take a decision in a few seconds
Use your resources wisely and spend quality time on developing your resources
Convert your time into value
Sometimes, changing circumstances also changes relationships.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: Proper and effective use of time yields good result
Well-intentioned but ill-informed actions usually compromise quality.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: Get your idea into image and find ways to convert it into tangible product
Time management is essential for a work-life balance.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: Leaders rule hearts, not people.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: Always work and take productive actions
You need speed to regain your lost years
The Best Things In Life Aren't So Sweet But Their Results Are Sweeter!
contents.owner: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

contents.item: Always make positive use of every second and minute
Maximizing time is making sure that every second is accounted for
Don’t just be a deliverer of yourself, but a deliverer of your whole nation
I will never give up on my dreams. I have the patient to wait and work hard for its fulfillment.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Wasting time is when seconds, minutes and hours are passing without being converted
Give your best today you will create a better tomorrow.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Control yourself every passing second and make sure that no unit of time is being wasted
Joblessness opens the door for greater opportunities
Your calling multiplies you
The totality of your commitment will make you more efficient
Entrepreneurs utilize even a negative change positively.
Don’t let your society and environment dictate what you do with your time
A team succeeds where an individual fails.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: You need to understand the principle of intensity to reclaim time
Create/add value to your life on a daily basis
Once you are saved, you have to locate your own territory
Do not always act out of religion
A wise man loves any kind of work, be it spiritual, physical or intellectual
You can resolve any situation with wisdom
Intelligent efforts are successful.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: Grace is available to us from God, but it is located in our place of work
You have to discover the essence of your life
Always put your heart into and show commitment in whatever you do
Angry issues need settling time.
contents.owner: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

contents.item: You must live a life of self-consciousness always
Don't mistake activity with achievement.
The ability to be intense in whatever you do is a key factor in reclaiming your lost years
You’ve got little time on earth, make each day count
You throw away the substance from which life is made of when you waste time
Losing your job is an awesome opportunity to look inside yourself and make new discoveries
Time must be converted into product
The Artist always has the masters in his eyes.
The goal is not to be delivered of your problem only but to be an instrument of God
Time lost can never be regained
To convert a day is to produce a product
Success is determined by how best you can utilize your time
You need to discover how to invest your life
If it has to be done, take the responsibility to do it.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: As humans, we should be able to answer the question: “What do you do with your time?
In order to have success we have to make an effort and this demands persistent, diligent hard work
God gave you the knowledge and ability for you to advance His Kingdom through your work
Seek pleasure in work itself as in result you have no control.
contents.owner: Pravin Agarwal, 8 Course Meal For The Soul

contents.item: You can create any product from time
Investment is the best thing to do with time
The one who gets rich is the one who devotes himself to his work
